results.name: Permutations of 1,2,...,n for n=1,2,3,..., arranged antilexicographically.
link: Kerry Mitchell, Rows n = 1..7 of irregular triangle, flattened
formula: a(n)=m+1-s(n) where m=MAX{a(k): k<=n} and s=A030298.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
